1566520.name: Fantasy Grounds - Jans Tokenpack 22 - Oozes and Fungus
1566520.description:
Jans Tokenpack 22 - Oozes and Fungus

If you are planning an adventure in dark and wet locations such as caves and sewers, these oozes and fungi will make great encounters for your adventurers.
This pack has got you covered with all kinds of oozes, slimes, jellies, puddings, and other icky creatures such as the famous Gelatinous Cube, Black Pudding, Gray Ooze, and Ochre Jelly.
It includes mushrooms and fungus creatures such as the Myconid, the noisy Shrieker mushrooms, and the incredibly dangerous Corpse flower.
Enjoy the pack!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
Jan Loos
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
